body.name: DEPSTECH Webcam 4K, Zoomable Webcam with Microphone and Remote, Sony Sensor, 3X Digital Zoom, Noise-Canceling Mics, Auto-Focus, Low Light Correction Computer Camera, Works with Teams/OBS/Webex/Google
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 11 hrs 6 mins
features: 【𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚 𝐇𝐃 𝟒𝐊 & 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫】Built with a 1/2.55” Sony CMOS sensor that features up to 3840x2160 UHD resolution at 30fps, the upgrade DEPSTECH DW50 Pro web camera 4k produces vivid imagery with outstanding clarity, vibrant color rendition, and crisp details.

【𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝟑𝐗 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐙𝐨𝐨𝐦】With a remote control, you can control your video calls even when you're away from your desk. The remote allows you to support 3X digital zoom-in, turn off the webcam and volume, switch auto/fixed focus, adjust exposure/saturation, mirror your image, and more. Please note that the Zoom function is only available at 1080P resolution.

【𝐃𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐌𝐢𝐜𝐬 & 𝐍𝐨𝐢𝐬𝐞-𝐂𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠】The 4k webcam is equipped with dual microphones and digital noise filtering technology that can automatically pick up your voice and filter out background noise. Even in noisy surroundings, you can capture the sounds you want with ease.

【𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐅𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐬 & 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐫𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】The 4k webcam supports full HD video calling over the internet, making it feel like you're talking to someone face to face. With the functions of autofocus and automatic light correction, it can quickly capture and focus on any subject, showing details clearly and streaming clear video even in low-light conditions.

【𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 & 𝐔𝐒𝐁 𝐓𝐲𝐩𝐞 𝐂 𝐀𝐝𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐞𝐫】Our webcam for pc comes with a USB Type C adapter, not only convenient for Macbook Pro/Air users, but also compatible with a wide range of operating systems, including Mac OS and Windows Vista/7/8/10/11. Perfect for Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Skype, Facetime, Facebook, YouTube and any other popular video calling software.

【𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐭-𝐢𝐧 𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐜𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 & 𝐓𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐨𝐝 𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐝𝐞𝐝】We value your privacy security. When not in use, you can slide on the built-in privacy cover to provide security and peace of mind. The webcam is equipped with an extendable metal tripod, which is convenient for you to place the webcam on the desk.
【𝐂𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞】DEPSTECH pays great attention to the customer's shopping experience. If you have any questions or issues with the product, please do not hesitate to contact us.
【𝐀 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭 𝐆𝐢𝐟𝐭】DEPSTECH DW50 Pro 4K web camera for streaming is a special gift for your family or friends. Own it and make your connection even closer!

productInformation.value: Ultra HD 4K( With 3840x2160 resolution), Webcam with remote control, 3X Digital Zoom in, Brightness and Saturation Adjustment, Dual Noise Canceling Mics See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DEPSTECH DW50 Pro web camera, a professional webcam with remote, 3840x2160 resolution 8MP sony sensor resolution captures crisp details and offers fluid video. It supports 3X digital zoom-in, which brings you a more convenient and funny life experience.

Previous page 1/2.55” Sony Sensor Integrated with the 1/2.55 Sony sensor to produce the best image quality and color accuracy. Noice-Canceling Dual Mics Automatically eliminating background noise and clearly capturing sound up to 3 feet away. 4K UHD Webcam Features up to 3840x2160 resolution at 30fps to provide you crystal clear images and smooth video. Auto-Focus Intelligently adjusts to produce the best image quality to show your clearer face. Low Light Correction With auto white balance and auto-exposure control, it provides a better image and video quality. Next page 1 1/2.55” SONY SENSOR 2 DUAL MICS 3 4K UHD WEBCAM 4 AUTO-FOCUS 5 LOW LIGHT CORRECTION

Previous page Next page The DEPSTECH DW50 computer camera is used on many occasions and helps you finish your work smoothly. 1 Video Conference 2 Video Chatting 3 Online Teaching 4 Gaming 5 Living Streaming

Webcam with Remote Control It support 3X digital zoom-in, turn off the image and volume, switch auto/fixed focus, adjust exposure/saturation, mirror your image, and more. (Please note that the battery is not included, please purchase 2 AAA batteries by yourself in advance.)

Smooth and Crystal Clear Video The DEPSTECH DW50 Pro 4K Webcam produces vivid imagery with outstanding clarity, vibrant color rendition, and crisp details. Super high-resolution imagery is achieved with 1/3" CMOS Sony Sensor even in low light conditions. 3X Digital Zoom-in Easily control your video calls with the included remote, even from a distance. With 3X digital zoom-in, this webcam makes it possible to zoom in gradually with a single press of a button. (Note: Zoom function is available at 1080P resolution)
80 Degrees Fit Angle View Giving you an unparalleled perspective for a wide variety of conditions when you are telecommuting or multi-person chatting.

Is it a true 4k webcam? How to confirm the resolution of this webcam? DEPSTECH DW50 Pro is a 4K UHD webcam features up to 3840x2160 resolution. Test: webcamtests.com/resolution (Please use Chrome browser to test the resolution, because some of the browsers will limit the output of the video resolution of the webcam.) Can I use the zoom function on the remote for any video software? Yes, it is working fine for Zoom Meetings, Skype, Facetime and any other popular video software. But please note that the Zoom function is available at 1080P resolution only. Is the remote control sensitive enough? Yes, you can control it with a distance of about 15m or more in all directions. Very convenient to use. And remember that the battery is not included, please purchase 2 AAA batteries by yourself, thanks. Is this DW50 Pro plug-and-play? Yes, just need to open the video software, and some software needs to manually select the device. How can I get in touch with the seller for help? You can enter your order to write to the seller via messages or via DEPSTECH Support(support at depstech dot com) for help directly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible Value - DEPSTECH 4k Webcam - Designed for Hybrid workers!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I've done a fair amount of reviews for webcams over the past 3 years in particular given in my profession I lead several project teams leveraging audio/visual technology where I can in order to enhance the virtual meeting experience to the same level as a live in-person meeting. There are many pros and cons of each and many depend on staff's technical level of knowledge.The new DW-50 4k Webcam with Dual Noise Cancelling Microphones is the consummate webcam that in my experience leverages the best experience that both a meeting facilitator and/or participant will have that makes sense focused on the practical daily application for those primarily that work both at home AND in-office with the same equipment. This means you need portability, practical features that can be used in both environments, and affordability. This webcam exceeds in all of those core categories.Portability: Small formfactor design that easily attaches to any monitor screen, back of a conference room chair, and even a tripod. Weight of webcam is negligible weighing about the same as a Parker ballpoint pen.Practical Features: Wide angle is perfect for individuals only or an individual flanked by 2 co-workers on either side of conference room sitting position. If camera is placed on nearby conference room furniture and nearest meeting participant is at least 2 feet away, this camera will capture everyone in highly necessary HD or even 4k detail making it probably the most practical camera a hybrid worker should have in their office gear.Plug and Play - This designation is critical. This means that the webcam itself and all of its features will function attached to any desktop PC or laptop (both Windows and Mac) and functions completely without installing a single software application. This is essential for the worker that participates or leads meetings in-office whether full time or part time. Organization Security restrictions on restricting the ability to install software is critical and necessitates almost all business's to not allow employees to have administrative rights to install untested software. This camera will function completely soon as it is attached to the computer.Remote Control of Webcam is ALSO plug and play. I've only seen a small handful of webcams where the remote control doesn't require a software to be running on the computer to effectively control the camera. This remote control works directly with the webcam allowing intuitive control over: Brightness, Contrast, Zooming in and out, Auto-focus, and even color saturation WITHOUT the need to install software. This makes the webcam useful without having to work with your organization IT team to test and review the software which can be a lengthy process. It will simply work. I work in a highly secure environment protecting millions of PII and PHI information that even detects whether anything inserted into a USB port that contains storage will alert Information Security and immediately blocks the computer from the network. Though this webcam has many controllable features, it does not require or have the capacity to function as storage whilst offering incredible control over how the camera performs.Affordability: Whether you have only 1 webcam or 20 (I love my gadgets), this should be the first one. I have never seen a camera less than a 100 with half of these features and the price with coupons brings that price down by much more (looks like $59). That is crazy cheap for a reliable, well built device offering features typically found in cameras above $200 US.Verdict: Must have for its dependability, sound clarity, and practicality for anyone needing a mobile solution that works with desktops or laptops that they have no control of with regards to installing their own software. I fully endorse this product manufactured by Depstech and as sold by Botan Direct. Depstech has been consistent in every product I have reviewed and Botan Direct as a reseller ships quickly on Amazon (received 2 days after ordering). Being a prime eligible purchase, test it for yourself. You have 30 days, no questions asked (or at least required), if even after use you decide it doesn't work for you and you will be refunded upon return (at no cost to you). Great job Botan Direct AND Depstech for excellent service and build quality.A+++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product at a value price. Works great. High quality. Love the remote control. Would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Camera, easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: This product beats my expectations. Though it is not the best quality out there, but it is decent for the price. So if you're looking for a low budget web cam, this is your go to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid alternative or extra to built in cams
reviews.reviewText: Great camera to supplement built in cams. I bought this to be an additional option to the built in cam on my laptop. I have a multi monitor setup and I don’t like having to look toward my smallest display (the laptop) to have “eye contact” during calls when I have two 32” monitors next to it. So I perched this on top of my middle display and it works great.There were no install issues. Plugged in the USB and it showed up as an option in seconds.The quality is definitely better than my built in webcam. That’s nice but it’s not like I’m filming movies. 99% of the time it’s my face on work calls. Doesn’t exactly require 8K :)The remote is nice to have but I bet I won’t use it that often. Cool to be able to adjust settings on the fly (like brightness, focus, camera and mic on/off, and flipping perspective) but I’m guessing once I get the settings fully dialed in, it’ll start collecting dust.Overall, great camera for the price. Comes with a fun little tripod too in case you don’t want to perch it on your monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid camera, great value
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I posted a video review showing the video quality- be sure to check that out. This camera has worked well for me since I bought it a few weeks back. I do not use the remote but would have no issues using it if I needed to.Overall, the picture quality is good for meetings or to make videos. I have made several teaching and informational videos for various uses using this camera and I have appreciated its crisp quality and stable performance. I've even used it for a videoconference with a large audience and it worked very well. The mic is adequate, but I normally use a desktop one that gives me a more rich tone. However, the mic on the camera does pick me up well when I speak.All in all, a good camera for the value. I'd definitely get it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Picture quality was OK
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality wasn’t what I expected. The soundFine it connected to my computer no problem. The picture just wasn’t expected. It wasn’t bad, but it didn’t seem 4K.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Check all the boxes
reviews.reviewText: Got a great Black Friday deal on this camera. I had not heard of the brand but it had gotten good reviews. The camera is decent quality for the price. The housing itself is wide to accommodate the mics but well balanced, and the camera swivels and can be adjusted on the mount and stays in place once you get it set. It has a physical internal slide cover built in for privacy. The mics pic up just enough sound and the remote makes it easy to make quick adjustments (Zoom, focus, lighting, mirror, etc..), though it's rather large for a camera remote (not a downside, just an observation).The tripod it comes with is sturdy and telescopic, making it easy to adjust for varying heights.. The top monitor mount is adequate and it holds.Easy setup and overall very happy with the product.

Really nice webcam. Packaging is nice. Parts feel well made. Camera operates well. Remote and tripod are handy. Picture quality is great. Mic is ok. Plug and play. Not sure this cam could be beat at the price point. Would buy again.
Me encantó la cámara, es genial.

J'ai acheté cette Webcam pour remplacer l'ancienne pour avoir la résolution 4K. Vraiment, ça me change la vie. Je donne des cours et je fais des réunions en utilisant Teams ou zoom. La qualité des vidéos est excellente. le design est sobre et sympa. Le prix est raisonnable par rapport à la concurrence. Le branchement, rien à faire juste connecter l'usb, la webcam est reconnu automatiquement. Si vous être mal payé comme moi et vous voulez une caméra de qualité sans trop débourser, je vous conseil cette Webcam. Dernière chose, le sav est top.
Ist meine erste Cam und muss sagen super Bild Ton ok .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this webcam for just over a month now and I must say I am very impressed with the picture quality and the 4K resolution.The camera has a remote which allows you to adjust settings such as brightness, contrast and saturation etc. It takes two AAA batteries (not included). The remote also performs other functions such as autofocus on/off and muting the microphone. The camera itself has dual microphones which provide a good quality sound, with noise cancellation.Also in the box you will find a tripod, which seems quite well made and could also be used for other cameras as well as it has a standard screw fitting.There is also a USB-C adaptor and instruction book. The instruction book is multi-language, clear to understand, but could have had bigger print. Having said that the camera is pretty straight forward to use and plug and play. I had mine up and running, in use without any issues at all. The camera works on all versions of Windows and Mac operating systems.The camera has a privacy shutter for when not in use and a good study clip if you want to use it with a laptop or similar device.I personally think this webcam is a great value for money. And a good quality product. Ideal for video streaming, conferencing, Skype, Teams and anything else you need a webcam for. I highly recommend it.
